profiles.name: APUSteeringExclude
profiles.note: Profile for applications which should not be steered to the APU by SmartShift Eco (1.0 - 1.5).

profiles.name: GPUConnectExclude
profiles.note: Profile for applications which should not block a dGPU power down by SmartShift Eco (1.5).

profiles.name: ExcludeAll
profiles.note: Profile for applications which should not be steered to the APU and should not block a dGPU power down by SmartShift Eco (1.0 - 1.5).
